ygData.subject: Digest Comments
ygData.msgSnippet: No virus here, I didn t even see a quarantine message from the server. I have yet to go to an LARP/SCA event, but I have enjoyed making costumes for our
ygData.messageBody:
No virus here, I didn't even see a quarantine message from the server.

I have yet to go to an LARP/SCA event, but I have enjoyed making costumes
for our Excalibur Gathering last year. I don't go to SCA lengths but try to
make period pieces that look authentic without spending a ton. They come in
handy at Halloween and when we go to the Medival Faires also.
Snicker's Amtgard site was long the memory tag I searched for to find the
early EQ bard song lists also. There is/was a link off his site.

Atonal: no mask yet?! Be sure and hang around and try for a bag off the
supplier. Same room and it's his common drop. I just got the Erudite
illusion mask the other week. Makes my kylong legs look much better with my
green bp and arms and hides my imbrued boots.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
